criteria: Ability to Explain Influence on Health Promotion
Ability to Explain Influence on Disease Prevention
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of public health policies.
Shows a limited understanding of public health policies; struggles to define what they are.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of public health policies; can define what they are but struggles with examples.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of public health policies; can define and give basic examples.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of public health policies; can define, give examples, and explain their purpose.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of public health policies; can define, give examples, explain their purpose, and analyze their effectiveness.
Demonstrates no understanding of government regulations related to health.
Shows a limited understanding of government regulations related to health; struggles to define what they are.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of government regulations related to health; can define what they are but struggles with examples.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of government regulations related to health; can define and give basic examples.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of government regulations related to health; can define, give examples, and explain their purpose.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of government regulations related to health; can define, give examples, explain their purpose, and analyze their effectiveness.
Unable to explain how policies and regulations influence health promotion.
Struggles to explain how policies and regulations influence health promotion; connection is unclear.
Explains a limited connection between policies/regulations and health promotion; explanation is superficial.
Explains how policies and regulations influence health promotion with some clarity and examples.
Clearly explains how policies and regulations influence health promotion with specific examples and reasoning.
Insightfully explains how policies and regulations influence health promotion, providing nuanced examples and demonstrating a deep understanding of the mechanisms at play.
Unable to explain how policies and regulations influence disease prevention.
Struggles to explain how policies and regulations influence disease prevention; connection is unclear.
Explains a limited connection between policies/regulations and disease prevention; explanation is superficial.
Explains how policies and regulations influence disease prevention with some clarity and examples.
Clearly explains how policies and regulations influence disease prevention with specific examples and reasoning.
Insightfully explains how policies and regulations influence disease prevention, providing nuanced examples and demonstrating a deep understanding of the mechanisms at play.
